org.hps.record.composite

Class LcioEventSupplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freehep.record.loop.AbstractLoopListener
      • org.hps.record.composite.CompositeLoopAdapter
        • org.hps.record.composite.LcioEventSupplier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freehep.record.loop.LoopListener, org.freehep.record.loop.RecordListener

    public class LcioEventSupplier
extends CompositeLoopAdapter
    This is an adapter that can supply LCIO EventHeader objects to JAS3 via a registered DataSource in order to activate Wired, the LCSim Event Browser, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private LcioEventQueue events
      The LCIO event queue which supplies records.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LcioEventSupplier(long timeoutMillis, int maxSize)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recordSupplied(org.freehep.record.loop.RecordEvent record)
      Process composite records by adding their LCIO event references to the queue in order to supply them to JAS3.
